trans-unit.source: Configures the output cache for a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 設定 Web 應用程式的輸出快取。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The OutputCacheSection class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `OutputCache` section.
trans-unit.target: OutputCacheSection 類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`OutputCache`> 一節。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The OutputCacheSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: OutputCacheSection 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the ASP.NET default output-cache provider that is stored in the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"></xref> element of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存在 ASP.NET 預設輸出快取提供者的名稱<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"></xref>組態檔元素。

trans-unit.source: The default output-cache provider for ASP.NET is not a provider of type <xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 的預設輸出快取提供者不是型別<xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Caching.OutputCacheProvider>的提供者

trans-unit.source: It is the original, in-memory provider that is used by ASP.NET for output caching.
trans-unit.target: 它是原始、 記憶體中的提供者，可由 ASP.NET 輸出快取。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `AspNetInternalProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 `AspNetInternalProvider`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the default provider.
trans-unit.target: 預設提供者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the fragment cache is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用片段快取。

trans-unit.source: If the EnableFragmentCache property is set to `false`, no user control output is cached, regardless of the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or caching profile used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 EnableFragmentCache 屬性設定為`false`，任何使用者控制項的輸出是快取，而不論[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞或快取使用的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the fragment cache is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用 片段快取。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether kernel caching is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用的核心快取。

trans-unit.source: If static compression is enabled for the request but the client requested an uncompressed response, then kernel caching is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果靜態壓縮已啟用要求，但用戶端要求壓縮的回應，然後核心快取已停用。

trans-unit.source: Only compressed responses are cached in kernel.
trans-unit.target: 核心中快取壓縮的回應。

trans-unit.source: Setting the EnableKernelCacheForVaryByStar property to `true` doesn’t ensure kernel caching of responses.
trans-unit.target: EnableKernelCacheForVaryByStar 屬性設定為`true`不確定的回應的核心快取。

trans-unit.source: Modules in the processing pipeline must set the kernel cache policy.
trans-unit.target: 處理管線中的模組必須設定的核心快取原則。

trans-unit.source: EnableKernelCacheForVaryByStar is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進 EnableKernelCacheForVaryByStar。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if kernel caching is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用的核心快取。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the output cache is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用輸出快取。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection.EnableFragmentCache%2A> property is set to `false`, no page is cached on the server, regardless of the settings in [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or caching profile used by the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection.EnableFragmentCache%2A>屬性設定為`false`，沒有頁面會在伺服器上，不論中設定快取[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞或快取頁面使用的設定檔。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection.EnableFragmentCache%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the output cache is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用輸出快取。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_vary" name="vary" href=""></xref> header is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_vary" name="vary" href=""></xref>標頭已啟用。

trans-unit.source: The `vary` header indicates the request-header fields that the server uses to determine which of multiple cached responses are sent in response to a client request.
trans-unit.target: `vary`標頭指出伺服器用來決定的多個快取的回應會傳送回應至用戶端要求中的要求標頭欄位。

trans-unit.source: The default for the OmitVaryStar property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: OmitVaryStar 屬性的預設值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET sends the `vary` header in all `POST` requests, as well as in all GET-request query strings.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET 會`vary`中所有標頭`POST`要求，以及與所有 GET 要求查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: If the OmitVaryStar is `true`, ASP.NET omits the `vary` header when returning the response for cached pages, provided that the `GET` request to a response is cached with no `VaryByCustom` property and the `POST` request to a response is cached with no `VaryByParam` property and no `VaryByCustom` property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 OmitVaryStar `true`，ASP.NET 會省略`vary`標頭時傳回的回應快取的頁面，但前提是`GET`至回應的要求會使用無快取`VaryByCustom`屬性和`POST`至回應的要求會使用無快取`VaryByParam`屬性，且沒有`VaryByCustom`屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_vary" name="vary" href=""></xref> header is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_vary" name="vary" href=""></xref>標頭已啟用，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of output-cache providers that are stored in the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"></xref> element of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定儲存在輸出快取提供者的集合<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection"></xref>組態檔元素。

trans-unit.source: The collection of providers.
trans-unit.target: 提供者的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_cache-control:private" name="cache-control:private" href=""></xref> header is sent by the output cache module by default.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_cache-control:private" name="cache-control:private" href=""></xref>標頭傳送預設輸出快取模組。

trans-unit.source: The SendCacheControlHeader applies to content with no output caching specified.
trans-unit.target: SendCacheControlHeader 適用於指定任何輸出快取內容。

trans-unit.source: When it is set to `false`, the `cache-control:private` header is not sent by default.
trans-unit.target: 當設定為`false`、`cache-control:private`預設不會傳送標頭。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This setting enables the content to be cached on the client by default.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這項設定可讓用戶端上的預設快取的內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the sending of <xref uid="langword_csharp_cache-control:private" name="cache-control:private" href=""></xref> header is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果傳送<xref uid="langword_csharp_cache-control:private" name="cache-control:private" href=""></xref>標頭已啟用，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
